Aden Auction House Manager:
Welcome, adventurer. Are you familiar with our services?
We are sales intermediaries. We enable you to view and purchase goods from all over the continent at rock bottom prices! And, if you have items you want to sell, we can handle those transactions for you.
Leave the worry and the paperwork to us! All you need to is pay us a small transaction fee, and we'll take care of the rest. When an item sells, we'll transfer the proceeds to you, minus a slight transaction fee, of course.
What do you think? You interested?
[npc_%objectId%_ShowCommission|Use Auction House.]
